functions.name: cosmosdb_manualbackup_public_accessibility
functions.description: Checks if manual backups are publicly accessible.

functions.description: Checks if backups are publicly accessible.

functions.description: Checks if cluster monitor log export is enabled.

functions.name: cosmosdb_mongodb_cluster_diagnostic_settings_audit_logs
functions.description: Checks MongoDB cluster diagnostic settings for audit logs.

functions.description: Checks if cluster audit log export is enabled.

functions.description: Checks if MongoDB cluster diagnostic settings audit logs are enabled.

functions.description: Checks if snapshots are publicly accessible.

functions.name: cosmosdb_cluster_retention_period_minimum_days
functions.description: Checks cluster retention period for minimum days.

functions.name: cosmosdb_accelerator_cluster_tls_encryption
functions.description: Checks if accelerator cluster TLS encryption is enabled.

functions.name: cosmosdb_table_pitr_enabled
functions.description: Checks if table point-in-time restore (PITR) is enabled.

functions.name: cosmosdb_mongodb_api_storage_encryption_enabled
functions.description: Checks if MongoDB API storage encryption is enabled.

functions.name: cosmosdb_table_encryption_with_managed_hsm_key_presence
functions.description: Checks if table encryption with managed HSM key is present.

functions.description: Checks if SQL database storage encryption is enabled.

functions.name: cosmosdb_cluster_automatic_backups_encrypted
functions.description: Checks if cluster automatic backups are encrypted.

functions.name: cosmosdb_cluster_azure_monitor_log_export_enabled
functions.description: Checks if cluster Azure Monitor log export is enabled.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Cosmosdb API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
